00030 #ifndef _LOWLEVEL_H_
00031 #define _LOWLEVEL_H_
00032 
00033 typedef unsigned char uchar;
00034 
00035 
00036 #define BCDop10000(value,digit)\
00037 __asm__ __volatile__(           \
00038 "ldi %1, -1"             "\n\t" \
00039 "BCD_%=: "               "\n\t" \
00040 "inc %1"                 "\n\t" \
00041 "subi %A0,  0x10"        "\n\t" \
00042 "sbci %B0,  0x27"        "\n\t" \
00043 "brsh BCD_%="            "\n\t" \
00044 "subi %A0,  0xF0"        "\n\t" \
00045 "sbci %B0,  0xD8"        "\n\t" \
00046 :                               \
00047 : "w" (value), "d" (digit)      \
00048 )
00049 
00050 #define BCDop1000(value,digit) \
00051 __asm__ __volatile__(           \
00052 "ldi %1, -1"             "\n\t" \
00053 "BCD_%=: "               "\n\t" \
00054 "inc %1"                 "\n\t" \
00055 "subi %A0,  0xE8"        "\n\t" \
00056 "sbci %B0,  0x03"        "\n\t" \
00057 "brsh BCD_%="            "\n\t" \
00058 "subi %A0,  0x18"        "\n\t" \
00059 "sbci %B0,  0xFC"        "\n\t" \
00060 :                               \
00061 : "w" (value), "d" (digit)      \
00062 )
00063 
00064 #define BCDop100(value,digit) \
00065 __asm__ __volatile__(           \
00066 "ldi %1, -1"             "\n\t" \
00067 "BCD_%=: "               "\n\t" \
00068 "inc %1"                 "\n\t" \
00069 "subi %A0,  0x64"        "\n\t" \
00070 "sbci %B0,  0x00"        "\n\t" \
00071 "brsh BCD_%="            "\n\t" \
00072 "subi %A0,  0x9C"        "\n\t" \
00073 :                               \
00074 : "w" (value), "d" (digit)      \
00075 )
00076 
00077 #define BCDop10(value,digit) \
00078 __asm__ __volatile__(           \
00079 "ldi %1, -1"             "\n\t" \
00080 "BCD_%=: "               "\n\t" \
00081 "inc %1"                 "\n\t" \
00082 "subi %A0,    10"        "\n\t" \
00083 "brsh BCD_%="            "\n\t" \
00084 "subi %A0,   -10"        "\n\t" \
00085 :                               \
00086 : "w" (value), "d" (digit)      \
00087 )
00088 
00089 #define expand2x(inVar) \
00090  __asm__ __volatile__ (       \
00091 "push r16"             "\n\t" \
00092 "ldi r16, 4"           "\n\t" \
00093 "L_%=: " "lsr %0"      "\n\t" \
00094 "ror r1"               "\n\t" \
00095 "lsr r1"               "\n\t" \
00096 "dec r16"              "\n\t" \
00097 "brne L_%="            "\n\t" \
00098 "mov %0,r1"            "\n\t" \
00099 "lsl %0"               "\n\t" \
00100 "or  %0,r1"            "\n\t" \
00101 "eor r1,r1"            "\n\t" \
00102 "pop r16"              "\n\t" \
00103 :                             \
00104 : "r" (inVar)                 \
00105 )
00106 
00107 #define swap_if_bit(inVar,bitf,num) \
00108  __asm__ __volatile__ (       \
00109 "sbrs %1, %2"              "\n\t" \
00110 "swap %0"              "\n\t" \
00111 :                             \
00112 : "r" (inVar), "r" (bitf), "I" (num)                 \
00113 )
00114 
00115 #define swap(value) asm volatile("swap %0" : "=r" (value) : "0" (value))
00116 
00117 #define bit8_invert(reg)        \
00118 asm volatile(                   \
00119  "com %0"                "\n\t" \
00120  "lsl %0"                "\n\t" \
00121  "com %0"                "\n\t" \
00122  "ror %0"                "\n\t" \
00123  :                              \
00124  : "r" (reg)                    \
00125 )
00126 
00127 #endif // _LOWLEVEL_H_
